139223.「本当に クラスを変更しますか？\n<yesno_2><break>: Are you sure you want to change classes?<yesno_2><break>

139225.「クラスを変更したいのですね。\n 確かに そのような制度は あるのですが\n:
I'd like to change my class... It's true that there is such a system, but there are conditions, so please listen carefully... If
you want to go back to your original class, you can't, so please think carefully before doing so... Also, you can't change your class
again within a week of changing it, so please pay attention to that as well...

139227.「あら。\n 新しいクラスになって １週間以内のようね。\n まだ クラス変更は:
Oh, my. You've been in your new class for less than a week... I can't change classes yet... If you want to change your class, can
you come back in <%nL_DAY>?

139229.「手続きを 受け付けました。\n クラスを変更することで\n 学生手帳も 新しい:
We'll be accepting applications... If you change your class, you'll need a new student handbook... I apologize for the
inconvenience, but you'll need to pick up a new student handbook from the information desk at the Gran Zedora station.

139230.「申し訳ありません。\n なんでもいいので 好きなものを\n 教えていただけます:
I'm sorry... I was wondering if you could
tell me what your favorite thing is.<bw_break>

139232.「入力した内容を 破棄して\n よろしいですか？\n<yesno_2><brea:
Are you sure you want to destroy the
information you've entered?<yesno_2><break>

139234.「では どのフレンドのクラスに\n 移動するか 教えてもらえますか。\n<bre:
Now, if you could tell me which friend's
class I should move to...<break>

139236.「何について 聞きたいのでしょう？\n<select_se_off>\nクラス変:
What do you want to ask me about?
<select_se_off>
Class Change
Change of appearance
Change of Favorite Things
About Personality Assessment
About Class Publication Settings
<select_end>
<break>

139238.「今のクラスから 別のクラスへ\n 変更できる制度が あるのですが\n いくつか:
There is a system that allows you to change from your current class to another class, but there are some conditions... If you want to
go back to your original class, you can't. If you want to go back to your original class, you won't be able to, so please think
carefully before doing so... You can't go back to your original class if you want to.

139240.「今 みんなに お知らせしている\n あなたの すきなものを 変更できます。\n:
You can change your favorite thing that we're telling you about... You can change it anytime, as many times as you like, so please
enter your favorite thing at that time...

139242.「みんなに お知らせする\n 好きなものを 変更してもよろしいですか？\n<ye:
May I change my mind about what I like to
tell people?<yesno><break>

139244.「では 新しく設定する\n すきなものを 教えてもらえますか。\n<break>:
Now, if you could tell me what you'd like to
set up...<break>

139246.「了解しました。\n すきなものを 変更しておきますね。\n<bw_break>: Yes, sir. I'll just change the ones you like.<bw_break>

139248.「よくいらっしゃいました。\n ここでは すきなものを変更したり\n クラスの変:
Welcome... Here, you can change your
preferences, sign up for a new class...
<select_se_off>
Change the class
Change your appearance
Change your favorite things
Take a personality test
Class Publication Settings
Listen to the explanation
<select_end>
<break>

139771.「また 変更したくなりましたら\n いつでも 来てくださいね。\n<end>:
If you ever want to make any changes, please
feel free to come back...<end>

140305.「確かに クラス変更は 可能なのですが\n 今は 教室が 封印されてしまっていて:
It's true that class reassignment is possible, but right now the classrooms are sealed off, so the system doesn't work. I'm
sorry, I can't change classes right now... I wish I could do something about the sealing...

153810.「申し訳ありません。\n そちらは 登録できない単語が\n 含まれている ようで:
I'm sorry... I'm sorry, but it looks like
you've got some unregistered words in there.<bw_break>

154060.「もう一度 性格診断を行いますか？\n<yesno_2><break>:
Would you like me to run the personality test
again?<yesno_2><break>

154061.「わかりました。\n では 今からする質問に 答えてください。\n それによって:
I understand... Now, I'm going to ask you a few questions... By answering these questions, I will be able to determine your
character. There's no big deal, so feel free to take it easy, but please answer these questions with an open mind...

159587.「あら？ あなたは現在\n 部活動の行事に 参加中のようですね。\n<br>\n:
Oh? It appears that you are currently participating in a club event... If I change my class, I will be participating in a club
event in a new class... If I change my class, I will no longer receive the rewards for my club activities in my current class.

159588.「あら？ あなたはまだ\n 今月の 部活動の報酬を\n 受け取って いないみたい:
Oh? It looks like you haven't received this month's club fees... You'll have to wait until you've received your club fees before
you can change classes...

159589.「入学時の性格診断を もう一度\n 行うことが できます。\n<br>\n「新た:
I'd like to take the personality test again. If you're looking to start your school life with a fresh outlook, please feel free to
take the test, but please answer with an open mind...

175855.「あなたのクラスを\n フレンドに 公開するか\n 設定を変更できます。\n<s:
You can make your class available to your
friends, or you can change the settings...
<select_se_off>
Publish
make private
<select_end>
<close>

175856.「あなたのクラスを\n フレンドに 公開するかを設定できます。\n<br>\n「:
If you want to invite friends to your class, set it to "Public. If you want to invite your friends to your class, please set it to
"Public".

175871.「移動可能な\n フレンドのクラスが\n 存在しないようですね。\n<bw_br:
It seems there are no friend classes that can
be moved.<bw_break>

175872.フレンドへのクラス公開設定を\n『非公開』に 設定しました！\n<end>:
I've set the class disclosure setting for my
friends to "Private"!<end>

175873.フレンドへのクラス公開設定を\n『公開』に 設定しました！\n<end>:
I've set the class disclosure setting to
"Public" for my friends!<end>

175887.「どちらの方法での\n クラス変更を ご希望ですか？\n<select_se_o:
Which method would you like to use to change
classes?
<select_se_off>
To some class
Go to Friend's class
<select_end>
<close>

177834.「申し訳ありません。\n そのフレンドのクラスは\n 空きがないため 移動できま:
I'm sorry... That friend's class is no longer
available, so we can move on...<bw_break>

177835.「申し訳ありません。\n クラス替えの手続きが 行えなかったようです。\n もう:
I'm sorry... I couldn't get through to you to
change classes. Please try again...<bw_break>

181524.「そのフレンドは\n あなたと 同じクラスのようですね。\n<bw_break>:
This friend of yours seems to be in the same
class as you...<bw_break>

185001.「あなたの学園での 容姿と性別を\n 変える魔法を かけ直すことができます。\n:
I can cast a spell that will change your
appearance and gender at the academy. Are you
sure you want to do this?<yesno2><break>

185002.「では 魔法をかけますので\n あなたの 学生としての見た目を\n 決めてくださ:
Now, I'm going to cast a spell, and you're
going to decide what you want to look like as
a student.<end>

185003.「学園の中での 容姿と性別を\n 変えることができる 特別な魔法を\n かけ直す:
A special spell that allows you to change your appearance and gender within the academy can be reapplied. However, if Dr. Reviva's
spell is causing you to appear as you did in Astoltia, it cannot be reapplied.

245536.「今のあなたには 学園での 容姿と性別を\n 変える魔法は かけ直せないようです:
I'm afraid you can't recreate the spell that
changed your appearance and gender at the
academy. You'll have to talk to Dr. Reviva.<bw_break>
